All Classes

Class Description
AbstractProject
The configuration of a project
AddableEditTool
The interface that defines an "edit tool" whose graphical view can be added to the EditToolPanel.
Attributes
Defines character attributes, each with a foreground color and a weight.
BackgroundTheme
Defines colors for the dark and white background themes
BusyFunction
The execution of a task during which a wait cursor is displayed
Compilation
The compilation of java files using the Java Compiler API
Configurable
The interface that defines the configuration of a project.
Console
Represents the console with a text area and buttons for adding actions to run commands.
ConsolePanel
Defines the panel which contains the text area that functions as the console and a toolbar for actions to run commands.
CSSHighlighter
Syntax highlighting for CSS
CurrentLanguage
The language that is used depending on the type of file or user selection
Dialogs
Static methods to show dialogs using JOptionPane
Eadgyth
Contains the main method
Edit
The editing of text in an EditableDocument
EditableDocument
Represents the document that is edited
EditableText
The styled text that is edited
EditArea
Defines the panel that contains the area for editing text and the area that displays line numbers.
EditingStateReadable
The interface to read parameters related to the state of the document while it is edited
EditMenu
The menu for edit actions
EditToolPanel
Defines the panel to which a variable Component can be added.
EditTools
Constants that identify implementations of AddableEditTool
ExchangeEditor
An editor panel to edit and view text in a separate text area
ExtTabbedPane
The JTabbedPane for the editor.
ExtTabbedPaneUI
A modified appearance for the JTabbedPane.
FileChooser
Defines objects of JFileChooser to open and to save files
FileMenu
The menu for file actions
FileOpener
The interface to open a file
FilesFinder
The list of files in a directory and its sub-directories with a given file extension
FileTree
The display of a project's file system in a JTree.
FileUtils
Static methods for file operations
Finder
The graphical view for the finding and replacing of text
FontSettingWin
The dialog for setting the font and font size
FormatMenu
The menu for formatting actions
Formatter
The formatting of EditArea objects.
FunctionalAction
The action whose actionPerformed method uses the ActionListener specified in the constructor
GenericProject
Represents a project that is only defined by its directory
Highlighter
The interface to highlight text elements
HTMLHighlighter
Syntax highlighting for Html (or PHP)
HtmlProject
Represents a coding project in HTML
IconBuilder
The creation of an icon
IconFiles
Static ImageIcons
Indentation
The auto-indentation
InfoWin
The window that shows info about Eadgyth
JarBuilder
The creation of an executable jar file
JavaHighlighter
Syntax highlighting for Java
JavaProject
Represents a programming project in Java
JavascriptHighlighter
Syntax highlighting for Javascript
LanguageChanger
The interface to change the language
LanguageMenu
The menu for actions to change the language
Languages
Constants for languages
Libraries
Stores libraries in different configurations
LineNumbers
The line numbering
LinesFinder
Static methods to search for lines and line parameters
ListInputPanel
Defines a panel in which a list of strings is displayed in or obtained from a list of text fields

The main window
MenuBar
The menu bar that has the menus.
Created in MainWin

Syntax highlighting for Perl
PerlProject
Represents a programming project in Perl
PHPHighlighter
Syntax highlighting for PHP
PopupMenu
A popup menu with menu items for actions that can be selected after a file node or a folder node was right clicked.
Created in FileTree
Prefs
The preferences for the editor and for projects.
PrintableText
The styled text for printing to a printer
ProcessStarter
The starting of external system processes
ProjectActionsUpdate
The interface to update the actions to run, compile and build a project
ProjectCommands
The interface that defines the commands to compile, run and build a project.

The menu for project actions
Projects
The assigned projects.
ProjectSelector

Constants for project types

Represents a programming project in Python

Syntax highlighting for R

Represents a programming project in R
ScreenParams
The screen size and parameters that depend on the screen resolution.
SettingsWindow
The window that shows input options for the configuration of a project

The building of the content of SettingsWindow with selectable input options.
StatusBar
Defines the status bar
StyledText
The styled text
SyntaxConstants
Constants for strings and characters used for searching text elements
SyntaxHighlighter
The syntax highlighting
SyntaxUtils
Static variables and methods to search for text elements

Static system properties
TabbedDocuments
The documents in the tabs.
TaskRunner
The starting of tasks with certain predefined settings and behaviour of the UI.
TextChange
The interface to edit text programmatically
TextExchange
The exchange of text between an EditableDocument set in the constructor and a variable EditableDocument.
TextSearch
The search and replacemant of text or words in the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the main editor area
ToolBar
Defines the tool bar
TreePanel
Defines the panel which contains a tool bar and panel for adding a JTree
TypingEdit

UndoEdit
The undo and redo editing.

The menu for view actions
ViewSetter
